|brand = Netgear |model = R9000 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 11/13/2016 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/Netgear_R9000 |wlclass = AD7200 |series = Nighthawk X10 |type = wireless router |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = PY316200339,PPD-QCA9008-SBD1,PY317400405, |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Annapurna Labs;Alpine AL-514; |cpu1_cores = 4 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A15 |cpu1spd = 1.7 GHz <!-- 1.7GHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Spansion;S34ML04G200TFI00; |flash1size = 512 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 1 GiB |ram1chip = Nanya;NT5CC256M16DP-DI; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA8337N; |sw1chip = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA8337N; |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 6 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = IEEE 802.3/3u/3ab |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = B0:B9:8A |oui = B0:B9:8A
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = Linux;;;
|exp_if_types = USB 3.0, SFP+, M.2 |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 2 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = 1 |exp_M.2 = 1 |exp_hdmi_num = |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 19 |pwr_amp_dc = 3.16 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, 4-pin header,, |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Wave2, MU-MIMO, VHT160, 256QAM, DFS, WiGig, LACP, SFP+ (10GbE), |addchip = 2.4GHz RF Power Amplifier Module;Skyworks;SE2623L;;4; ,,, 5GHz RF Power Amplifier Module;RFMD;RFPA5542;;4; ,,, 2-port USB 3.0 PCIe Controller;ASMedia;ASM1024A;;1; ,,, 1x2 PCIe Packet Switch;ASMedia;ASM1182e;;1; |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac+ad
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = password |defaultssid = NETGEARXX |defaultssid_regex = ^NETGEAR[0-9]{2}$ |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = DD-WRT, [https://www.voxel-firmware.com/Downloads/Voxel/html/browse.html Voxel], [https://github.com/masmbit/Netgear-R9000-Build/tree/master/bin OpenWRT]
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 09/23/2016 |estreldate = 09/29/2016 |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B01M12RE4A |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = 316 mm x 264 mm x 61 mm |weight = 1680 g
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA9984; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = MHF4 |rad1txchains = 4 |rad1rxchains = 4 |rad1sstreams = 4 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |acqam1 = <!-- AC-qam --> |rad1ac = 1733 |rad1n = 600 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 5
|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA9984; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = MHF4 |rad2txchains = 4 |rad2rxchains = 4 |rad2sstreams = 4 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |nqam2 = 800 |rad2n = 600 |rad2g = 54 |rad2b = 1 |rad2freq = 2.4
|rad3mod = Qualcomm Atheros QCA9008-SBD1 |rad3modif = M.2 (1216) |rad3chip1 = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA9500; |rad3oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad3_ant_conn = MHF4 |rad3txchains = 1 |rad3rxchains = 1 |rad3sstreams = 1 |rad3stand = IEEE 802.11ad |rad3ad = 4620 |rad3freq = 60
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== {{FCC ST|03/21/2017|}} {{see also|Netgear R8900|Netgear|Annapurna Labs}}
* A new FCC entry (PY317400405) suggests that Netgear has removed the :Bluetooth circuitry and antenna in more recently manufactured devices. :See the [https://fccid.io/PY317400405/Letter/Expedited-Review-Letter-3771555 Expedited Review letter].
* This [[Netgear XR700]] is assumed to be internally identical to the [[Netgear R9000]]
===Product features=== *X10 is industryâ€™s fasted router for media streaming with Plex media server. *X10 with 802.11ac Wi-Fi technology delivers ultra-smooth 4K streaming, :VR gaming and instant downloads. *With a powerful 1.7 GHz Quad-core processor, 60 GHz 11ad, Quad-stream :architecture, you can enjoy combined wireless speeds of up to 7.2Gbps. *MU-MIMO supports simultaneous streaming, while 160 MHz doubles :WiFi speeds to mobile devices. *Four patent pending external active antennas amplify Wi-Fi signals :to maximize range and throughput. <!--*Get fastest speeds available up to 7.2Gbps *Tri-band Wi-Fi delivers more Wi-Fi to more devices *Quad Stream delivers up to four data streams per Wi-Fi band *4 active antennas and 4 internal antennas to amplify and maximize range *6 Gigabit Ethernet ports, aggregate two for faster file transfers (LAN1/2) *Smart Connect intelligently selects the fast Wi-Fi band for every device *MU-MIMO capable for simultaneous streaming of data to multiple devices *Dynamic QoS prioritizes bandwidth by application and device-->
===Specifications=== *CPU: [[Annapurna Labs]] Alpine [https://community.arm.com/processors/b/blog/posts/synology-s-ds2015xs-brings-arm-to-high-performance-nas-units AL-514] @1.7 GHz :Quad Core ARM Cortex-A15 (see also AL5140) *Memory: 512MB Flash (NAND) and 1GB RAM (DDR3) *Tri-Band: 60 GHz (4600Mbps), 5 GHz (1733Mbps), 2.4 GHz (800Mbps) :Supports 4x high-performance active antennas (like R8500) *WLAN: 2x [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9984 4T4R 802.11abgn/ac :*2.4GHz Radio: [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9984 4x4 MU-MIMO ::- [[Skyworks]] SE2623L 2.4GHz Power Amp (x4) :*5GHz Radio: [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9984 4x4 MU-MIMO ::- [[RFMD]] ([[Qorvo]]) RFPA5542 5GHz Power Amp (x4) :*60GHz Radio: [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9500 1x1 (AD4600) ::- [[Qualcomm Atheros QCA9008-SBD1]] module *Seven (7x GbE) 10/100/1000 Mbps ports: 1x WAN & 6x LAN :LACP - Dual Gigabit Ethernet Port Aggregation (LAN1+LAN2) :*Switch: 2x [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA8337N (4x GbE) *Ports: 2x USB 3.0, 1x SFP+ LAN 10GbE (10Gbps) port *Dimension:: 316 mm x 264 mm x 61 mm (WxHxD) *Weight: 1680 g
==Links of Interest== ===Reviews=== *[https://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/33046-netgear-r9000-nighthawk-x10-smart-wifi-router-reviewed ''Netgear R9000 Nighthawk X10 Smart WiFi Router'' on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] :[[Annapurna Labs]] Alpine AL314 (?) @1.7GHz (Quad-core ARM Cortex-A15) <!-- [[Annapurna Labs]] Alpine AL-314 @1.4GHz (Quad Core ARM Cortex-A15) --> :''ASMedia'' ASM1182e 1x2 PCIe packet switch, QCA Bluetooth LE radio, :''ASMedia'' ASM1024A 2 port USB 3.0 PCIe controller *[https://www.digitalcitizen.life/netgear-nighthawk-x10-review ''Netgear Nighthawk X10 review'' on '''Digital Citizen''']
===Forum threads=== *[https://www.snbforums.com/threads/netgear-nighthawk-x10-ad7200-smart-wifi-router-r9000.34897/ ''Netgear R9000'' on '''SNBforums'''] *[https://openitforum.pl/forums/topic/1500-netgear-r9000-nighthawk-x10/ ''Netgear R9000'' on '''OpenITforum'''] (PL) *[https://forum.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=305025&postdays=0&postorder=asc&highlight=kong+build+r9000&start=0/ ''Netgear R9000'' on '''DD-WRT'''] *[https://forum.openwrt.org/t/netgear-x10-r9000/3913/741 ''Netgear R9000'' on '''OpenWRT''']
